execution_plan.description: Retrieve active products from the primary store database (products with is_active = true).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, name, sku, price, category_id, is_active, created_at FROM products WHERE is_active = true;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve active items from the alternate store database (items marked active = 'Y').
execution_plan.query: SELECT code, title, amount_in_cents, group_ref, active, created_on FROM items WHERE active = 'Y';
